dmca.title: DMCA notice to Google, Inc.
dmca.body:
September 25, 2007

VIA EMAIL/USPS

Google Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, Blogger DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA [private]
[private]@google.com

Re: Shanghai Kiss

To Whom It May Concern:

It has come to my attention that your website, http://rapidshare-com.blogspot.com/ is selling, facilitating the selling and/or downloading of (http://rapidshare-com.blogspot.com/2007/09/shanghai-kiss-2007-dvdscr-xvid.html) advertising, marketing, or otherwise exploiting, the titles, "Shanghai Kiss" (the "Production").  Starz Media, LLC Production that you are exploiting without authorization, including but not limited to the right to license, advertise, exploit, or otherwise market the Production.

Accordingly, we hereby insist that http://rapidshare-com.blogspot.com/ cease and desist from the unauthorized selling, downloading, exploitation, advertising, or otherwise marketing of the Production and from the use of any unauthorized copyrighted material; immediately account for and turn over all monies and/or other consideration collected in connection with this unauthorized distribution; and immediately return all copies and/or other materials of the Production or destroy such copies and materials and provide us with a notarized certificate of destruction.  In the event that any such unauthorized distribution of the Production or use of unauthorized copyrighted material results in any claims, liabilities, or damages being incurred by Starz Media, LLC, we will hold you fully liable for such claims, liabilities, or damages.

Nothing set forth herein should be construed as a waiver of any of the rights or remedies of Starz Media, LLC, all of which are hereby reserved.

If you have any questions about the nature or scope of the rights asserted herein, please do not hesitate to contact me.  I trust that this matter can be resolved in an amicable manner immediately.

Very truly yours,
[private], Esq.

Cc: [private], PC (via e-mail w/ enclosures)
[private], Esq. (via email w/ enclosures)
[private] (via email w/ enclosures)
[private](via email w/ enclosures)
[private] (via email w/ enclosures)
[private] (via email w/ enclosures)
[private] (via email w/enclosures)
